courses.title: HTML Course for Beginners
courses.subtitle: Learn HTML from scratch and start your web development journey

mainContent.content: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard language used to create web pages. It tells the browser how to display text, images, and other elements. HTML is the backbone of all websites and is the first step to becoming a web developer.
Basic Structure of an HTML Document
HTML documents are made up of elements that usually have an opening tag, content, and a closing tag.
Forms allow users to input data.
HTML5 introduced semantic elements that clearly describe their meaning.

courses.title: Front End Development - CSS
courses.subtitle: Style your web pages beautifully with CSS

mainContent.content: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages — for example, to change fonts, colors, spacing, and positioning of HTML elements. CSS makes your website look attractive and user-friendly.
CSS works by selecting HTML elements and applying styles to them. These styles are applied using selectors and properties.

items: Inline CSS - Styles applied directly inside the HTML tag.
Internal CSS - Styles written inside a <style> tag in the HTML file.
External CSS - Styles written in a separate .css file and linked to the HTML file.
.classname - Selects elements with a specific class.
#idname - Selects an element with a specific ID.

mainContent.content: The CSS box model describes how the size of an element is calculated: content, padding, border, margin.

courses.title: Python Programming
courses.subtitle: Learn one of the most popular programming languages in the world

mainContent.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It’s widely used in web development, data science, artificial intelligence, automation, and more.

items: Versatile — used in web, AI, data science, and automation.

mainContent.content:
# Inside a Python file (example.py)
print("Hello, Python!")

items: Data Types: String, Integer, Float, Boolean, List, Tuple, Dictionary.

mainContent.content:
name = "John"  # String
age = 25       # Integer
is_student = True  # Boolean

def greet():
    print("Hello, " + name)

greet()  # Output: Hello, John

for i in range(1, 6):
    print("Number:", i)

courses.title: AWS for Beginners
courses.subtitle: Learn the basics of Amazon Web Services and start your cloud journey

mainContent.content: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and widely used cloud platform, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally. It enables businesses and developers to build, deploy, and manage applications in the cloud with ease.

items: High demand for AWS skills in the job market.
EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud): Virtual servers in the cloud.
S3 (Simple Storage Service): Secure and scalable storage.

mainContent.content: Example: Hosting a Website on AWS S3

1. Create an S3 bucket in your AWS account.
2. Upload your website files (HTML, CSS, JS).
3. Enable static website hosting in the bucket properties.
4. Make files public and use the provided S3 website URL.

courses.title: Introduction to JavaScript
courses.subtitle: Make your websites interactive with JavaScript

mainContent.content: JavaScript is a programming language used to make web pages interactive. It runs in the browser and allows you to add dynamic features such as form validation, animations, pop-ups, and real-time updates.

items: It’s essential for front-end web development.
Can also be used for back-end development (Node.js).
High demand in the job market.

mainContent.content: JavaScript can change HTML and CSS dynamically using the DOM (Document Object Model).
JavaScript responds to user actions such as clicks, mouse movements, and keyboard inputs.

courses.title: ChatGPT for Beginners
courses.subtitle: Learn how to use ChatGPT effectively for learning, work, and creativity

mainContent.content: ChatGPT is an advanced AI language model created by OpenAI. It can understand natural language and generate human-like responses, making it useful for learning, productivity, creativity, and coding assistance.

items: Boosts productivity by generating content, ideas, and code.
Helps with learning new skills and understanding concepts.
Useful for writing, research, and brainstorming.

mainContent.content: Tips for Getting the Best Results

items: Be specific: Provide detailed instructions in your prompts.
Use examples: Give ChatGPT examples to follow.
Refine prompts: If the answer isn’t perfect, rephrase your request.

mainContent.content:
"Write a 100-word story about a robot learning to paint."
"Explain recursion in simple terms."
"Suggest 5 healthy breakfast ideas."
"Generate HTML code for a basic website."

items: Creating stories, poems, and creative content

courses.title: SQL for Data Science
courses.subtitle: Master SQL to analyze and manage data effectively

mainContent.content: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a standard language used to manage and manipulate relational databases. It is a key skill for data analysis and data science, enabling you to extract insights from datasets.
Why Learn SQL for Data Science?

items: Essential for querying and analyzing datasets.
Used by all major relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, etc.).
Required for data analyst and data scientist roles.

mainContent.content:
-- Select all data from a table
SELECT * FROM employees;

items: WHERE: Filter results based on a condition.
ORDER BY: Sort results in ascending or descending order.

mainContent.content:
-- Filtering data
SELECT name, salary
FROM employees
WHERE salary > 50000;

-- Sorting data
SELECT name, department
FROM employees
ORDER BY department ASC;

-- Counting employees in each department
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS employee_count
FROM employees
GROUP BY department;

courses.title: Microsoft Azure for Beginners
courses.subtitle: Start your cloud journey with Microsoft Azure

mainContent.content: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform that provides a wide range of services such as virtual machines, databases, networking, and AI tools. It allows businesses and developers to build, deploy, and manage applications in the cloud.

items: High demand for Azure cloud professionals.
Helps in hosting, managing, and scaling apps easily.
Key skill for cloud and DevOps roles.
Azure Virtual Machines: Run apps in the cloud.
Azure Storage: Store and manage files securely.

mainContent.content: Example: Hosting a Website on Azure

1. Create a resource group in Azure.
2. Deploy an Azure Web App.
3. Upload your website files.
4. Access it using the given Azure URL.

courses.title: Introduction to Microsoft Excel
courses.subtitle: Master the basics of Excel for productivity and data handling

mainContent.content: Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet program that allows you to organize, analyze, and visualize data. It is widely used in businesses, education, and data analysis.

items: Helps in analyzing and managing data easily.

mainContent.content: =SUM(A1:A10)   // Adds values from A1 to A10

courses.title: Statistics for Data Science
courses.subtitle: Learn the statistical foundations needed for data analysis and machine learning

mainContent.content: Statistics is the science of collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data. It is a key skill for data scientists, helping them draw insights from datasets.
Why Learn Statistics for Data Science?

items: Understand how to analyze real-world data.
Foundation for machine learning and AI.
Helps in decision making and predictions.
Essential for data visualization and interpretation.

courses.title: Java Programming
courses.subtitle: Learn the fundamentals of Java programming for beginners

mainContent.content: Java is a powerful, object-oriented programming language widely used in software development, mobile apps, and backend systems. It is known for its portability and robustness.

items: Foundation for advanced technologies like Spring and Hibernate.

courses.title: C Programming for Beginners
courses.subtitle: Learn the basics of C programming and build a strong programming foundation

mainContent.content: C is a general-purpose programming language known as the 'mother of all languages.' It is fast, efficient, and widely used for system programming, embedded systems, and operating systems.

items: Helps understand how computers work at a low level.
Foundation for C++, Java, and other languages.
Used in embedded systems and OS development.
